name: Learn to Fly 3
description: Build your spaceship from scratch, earn funds and invest them into building a bigger, better spaceship as you try and fly your way up to space!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 2 GHz processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated GPU Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Vector graphics-based, CPU intensive
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 3 GHz processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Vector graphics-based, CPU intensive
